image.title: Osho - The complete works of Osho

item.title: Chapter title: Socialism is a judas
item.description: < Previous | Contents ‌Chapter title: Socialism is a judas‌ 3 February 1989 pm in Gautam the Buddha Auditorium Archive code: 8902035 ShortTitle: FIRE05 Audio: Yes Video: Yes Length: 180 mins OUR BELOVED MASTER, ON ONE OCCASION, A MONK ASKED MASTER DOGO: "EVEN IF THERE IS NO CLOUD FOR THOUSANDS OF MILES, IT IS NOT YET THE ORIGINAL SKY. WHAT IS THE ORIGINAL SKY?" DOGO REPLIED, "TODAY, IT IS GOOD TO DRY WHEAT.
